LOWES PROCESSING INSTRUCTIONS
==============================

VENDOR INFORMATION
------------------
QuickBooks Name: Lowe's
Default Account: Construction Materials
Default Class: Jobs
Payment Terms: Net 30

IDENTIFICATION PATTERNS
-----------------------
Logo/Text Markers:
- "LOWE'S"
- "Lowes"
- "lowes.com"
- "LOWE'S HOME IMPROVEMENT"

Store Numbers:
- Format: "Store #XXXX"
- Format: 4-digit number
- Common: #0434, #1789, #2567

Phone Patterns:
- 1-800-44-LOWES
- 1-800-445-6937

DOCUMENT FORMATS
----------------
Receipt Format:
- Header: Lowe's logo, store location
- Date/time below store info
- Items with item numbers
- MyLowes card number (if used)
- Footer: Subtotal, Tax, Total

Invoice Format:
- Pro/Commercial accounts
- Quote numbers
- Delivery information

EXTRACTION RULES
----------------
Date:
- Location: Below store address
- Format: MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:SS
- Label: Sometimes preceded by "Date:"

Amount:
- Look for: "TOTAL", "BALANCE DUE"
- Position: Last monetary value
- Bold or larger font

Tax:
- Label: "TAX", "Sales Tax"
- May be itemized by jurisdiction

Reference Number:
- Receipt: "Trans #" or "Transaction:"
- Format: XXX-XXXXX-XXXXX
- Invoice: "Invoice #"

Cashier/Register:
- Format: "Cashier: NAME" "Reg: XX"
- Include in notes

ITEM CATEGORIZATION
--------------------
Common Categories:
- Building Materials -> Construction Materials
- Paint -> Paint & Supplies
- Tools -> Tools & Equipment
- Garden -> Landscaping Supplies
- Appliances -> Equipment
- Flooring -> Flooring Materials

QUICKBOOKS POSTING
-------------------
Transaction Rules:
- Under $75: Post as Check
- $75-$500: Create Bill
- Over $500: Create Bill with manager approval

Account Mapping:
- Default: Construction Materials
- Garden items: Landscaping
- Appliances: Equipment
- Installation: Subcontractors

Memo Format:
"Lowes Store #[store] Trans #[trans] [date]"

CLASS ASSIGNMENT
----------------
- Check for MyLowes Pro job tracking
- Default: Current Active Job
- Split transactions by department

SPECIAL HANDLING
----------------
MyLowes Pro Account:
- Volume pricing
- 5% discount tracking
- Bid room purchases

Returns:
- Negative line items
- "RETURN" or "REFUND" label
- Create Credit Memo in QB

Special Orders:
- "SPO" designation
- May require deposit
- Track against PO

Delivery:
- Delivery fees separate line
- Post to Delivery Expense

COMMON ISSUES
-------------
- MyLowes card number privacy
- Military discount adjustments
- Price match adjustments
- Multiple payment methods

VALIDATION
----------
- Store number within valid range
- Tax calculation correct for jurisdiction
- Date within business hours
- Pro discount applied correctly

LOYALTY PROGRAM
---------------
MyLowes Pro:
- Track member number
- 5% off eligibility
- Volume purchase history

PRICE MATCHING
--------------
- Note "Price Match" adjustments
- Include competitor info in notes
- Affects margin calculations

FILE NAMING
-----------
Use standard format: MM-DD-YYYY_lowes_[type]_[number]_[amount].[ext]
Examples:
- Receipt: 01-15-2025_lowes_receipt_7890_156.78.jpg
- Invoice: 01-15-2025_lowes_invoice_5432_890.12.pdf
- Payment: 01-15-2025_lowes_check_2345_156.78.jpg
